short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Chrome extension for conveniently searching through Japanese dictionary site Jisho.org, right on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Search the Jisho API by clicking on popup and typing into searchbar
- Search via context-menu on highlighted text
- A resizable and moveable interface

I recommend you pin the icon to the taskbar for maximum convenience.

This project is open-source and available at: https://github.com/NoahTN/jisho-tansaku
Let me know of any issues or suggestions you may have!
